remarks:
Extract the second member of an ordered pair.  Theorem 5.12(ii) of [Monk1] p. 52.  (See ~ op1stb to extract the first member, ~ op2nda for an alternate version, and ~ op2nd for the preferred version.) (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2003.)
